description: These facemarks all have an asterisk for a cheek to show that they’re blushing. This is due to their shyness or embarrassment. Some of them have arms as if to scratch at their heads because they are not sure what else to do with themselves. Others are just trying to smile it off. title: Blushing Cheeks with an Asterisk
